message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11500. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $10000 for it. I hope this revised offer meets within your acceptable range.
Bob, I understand your position, but $10000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $10500? This is my final offer.
